sqlList: create table BasicTest (id bigint generated by default as identity, basicTest bigint, subTest bigint, testInt integer, testString varchar(20), testLong bigint, testDate date, testBoolean boolean, testFloat float, testDouble double, primary key (id))
create table SubTest (id bigint generated by default as identity, subTest bigint, name varchar(80), testString varchar(20), primary key (id))
create table Email (id bigint generated by default as identity, email varchar(80))
alter table BasicTest add constraint bt_bt foreign key (basicTest) references BasicTest
alter table BasicTest add constraint bt_st foreign key (subTest) references SubTest
alter table SubTest add constraint st_st foreign key (subTest) references SubTest
